link_desc:
** This webhook script sends notifications to Line via Line Notify.
If you want to send using Line messaging API, please use https://share.zabbix.com/zabbix-tools-and-utilities/cat-notifications/zabbix-line-notification

I made another one because Line messaging API free plan limits 1000 messages per month and sending messages to all of my team depletes the quota really fast. Line Notify service doesn't have this limit.


This is a webhook script for sending notifications to Line messenger app.

Line messenger is a popular instant messaging app in Japan, Taiwan, Thailand, Indonesia, Cambodia and Turkmenistan.

This script is a modified version of the Telegram webhook script that comes with Zabbix.


Instructions

1. Import the xml to Media types.

2. Issue a new access token from https://notify-bot.line.me/.

3. On Zabbix server, put the token on the "Send to" field in users media setting.

4. Enable notification action on your Zabbix server.
